pr_title: [Dogfood] New semgrep rule to prevent printing on stdout on semgrep codebase

timeline.author: aryx
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -12,3 +12,25 @@ rules:
     message: this will always be true
     languages: [ocaml]
     severity: ERROR
+
+  - id: no-print-in-semgrep

timeline.message:
[Dogfood] New semgrep rule to prevent printing on stdout on semgrep codebase

This can help https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep/issues/1630

test plan:
make check
